section.name: Introduction to HiveMind 2
section.div:
HiveMind 2 is a complete refactoring of HiveMind 1. The Refactoring was mainly done to support alternative ways of defining a registry and its services and configuration points.
New features:
Pure Java Registry Definition API
Annotation Based Definition API (Annotated modules)
Extensible Autowiring Service
Arbitrary Configuration Types

section.div:
HiveMind 2 is currently in alpha stage. New documentation is created on the wiki. Meanwhile you may have a look at the HiveMind 1 documentation.
Moreover be aware, that the new APIs are still subject to change.
